descriptionHtml:
====================================================
Withe01_BattleMageOutfit_UNPB
by Withe01
ver 1.00
====================================================
- Description -
This is mush-up armor MOD.

This MOD adds some female armors.
for UNPB.
Lorefriendly.

"BattleMage Cuirass" have five color variations.
"White" , "Black" , "Leather" and "White - see thru" , "Black - see thru".

Those are able to create by blacksmith.
"Leather" category.
Performance is the same as a dragon scale armor.

- Requirement -
UNPB Body

----------------------------------------------------
Changelog
----------------------------------------------------
ver 1.00
- Release

----------------------------------------------------
For Modder
----------------------------------------------------
This MOD includes some .pdn files for color change.

If you describe My name "Withe01" and other authors of CREDIT to your MOD, you can use this MOD's file for your MOD.
However, reproducing all the MOD as it is forbids.
I am looking forward to a good MOD.

----------------------------------------------------
Credit
----------------------------------------------------
I used a part of material of those MODs.

- "UNP UNPB BBP Ancient Nordic Rags (Author : nevenbridge )"
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39003
- "a little sexy apparel replacer - for CBBE UNP ADEC - with LSAR Addon (Author : Cotyounoyume)"
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5564
author: Withe01
